        public ByteBuffer allocateDirectBuffer​(int size)
        Description copied from interface: StorageManager
        AIO has an optimized buffer which has a method to release it instead of the way NIO will release data based on GC. These methods will use that buffer if the inner method supports it

        public LargeServerMessage createLargeMessage​(long id,
                                             Message message)
                                      throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: StorageManager
        Creates a new LargeMessage with the given id.
        message - This is a temporary message that holds the parsed properties. The remoting layer can't create a ServerMessage directly, then this will be replaced.
        Returns:
        a large message object

        Exception
